name: 2023 The 14th International Conference on Distance Learning and Education
content: Publication: Accepted papers will be published in one of the following open access journal on the basis of the paper topics: \* International Journal of Information and Education Technology (IJIET, ISSN: 2010-3689) Frequency: Monthly | DOI: 10.18178/IJIET Abstracting/ Indexing: Scopus (CiteScore 2021: 1.3), INSPEC (IET), UGC-CARE List (India), CNKI, EBSCO, Google Scholar \* International Journal of Learning and Teaching (IJLT, ISSN: 2377-2905) Frequency: Quarterly | DOI: 10.18178/ijlt Abstracting/Indexing: Google Scholar, Crossref, CNKI, etc.
